title: How to predict if new age tech cos will go boom or bust? Rahul Bhasin explains - Economic Times
content: How to predict if new age tech cos will go boom or bust? Rahul Bhasin explains  Economic Times
description: “There are various models for investing in technology and the most relevant one at this moment would be the Gartner model which talks about triggers for innovation. Then the peak of inflated expectations happens and followed by the trough of disillusionment which is what we are seeing now. It is typically followed by the slope of enlightenment. We will finally reach the plateau of productivity,”
